Articles.Content:
Couldn't help it. I had to post this!

If I had the time I'd edit the video to include some Kerbals! There's a challenge for you creative souls out there!

WARNING: This song will haunt you for the rest of your day!

that green guy looks awefully like a...

still waiting for the fun part though... and I don't think this will haunt me, the melody is rather unhaunting tbh. I admid though, if it were jeb, bob and bill to sing this, it might be funny indeed.
